events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn’t fit me at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a Refund request following the customer’s message about returning the jacket.
An agent from the Refunds team has been assigned to handle the customer’s return request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m here to help you with your return and refund for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 4532917. The jacket is unworn and still in its original packaging as I just received it yesterday.
Thanks for the info! I have initiated your return request. Once we receive the jacket back, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds great! I appreciate your quick response and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The money should appear in your account within a few days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since you confirmed your refund was received, I’m marking this case as closed. Thank you for contacting us!
We’ve sent a short survey to get your feedback about your return experience. We appreciate your input.
